content.raw:
Great! 

Minor nitpick : `target_compile_features` is fully supported by MSVC [1], so it may be worth to remove the `if(NOT MSVC)` block. 

This is not a big problem now because MSVC enables by default all the C++11/14 features it supports, but it could be handy if `ign-math` ever
requires C++17 [2].

[1] : https://cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.9/manual/cmake-compile-features.7.html#supported-compilers

[2] : https://blogs.msdn.microsoft.com/vcblog/2016/06/07/standards-version-switches-in-the-compiler/
